title: Trold - Once Upon A Time
description:
This is an invitation to the magic forests of Norway, an exploration of 

  the melodic side of Apoxina.



  Emotional soundscapes with chunky basslines and kicking drums, Trold&#039;s 

  music is pure psytrance that makes your feet movin&#039; ... and your mind

  trippin&#039; ...



  Trold was created in 99 by Bjorn Opheim, Stein Skjoldal and Leif 

  Askeland, their musical background lead them naturally to psychedelic 

  trance with a melodic touch.



  They played successful gigs in Norway, Sweden and Czech Rep., and got

  their first track released lately on Sundance Records comp. "Sundaze".



  This is a collection of 8 unreleased tracks from morning to full night, 

  finishing by a magnificent ambient tune, masterised by Tim Schuldt at 

  4 Carry Nuts Studios.
